clubText: French Club will meet in the fall of 2020 on Zoom. We will watch French videos and chat about them. We will have our annual murder mystery game too, all on Zoom! We will also try to play the French party game:  'Les loups garous de Thiercelieux' (werewolves) on Zoom.     Second semester, if allowed, we will return to our normal activities:  crÃªpe party, fondue party, etc. (each food activity will have a fee).
